    • setLeaderPowerOutput

      public void setLeaderPowerOutput​(int leaderSlotIndex, ResourceType output)
      This method sets the leader card
      Parameters:
      leaderSlotIndex - since the leader Slots get appended after the four default slots, it must be 4 or 5 to choose respectively to choose the first or the second Extra Production Power
      output - sets the ResourceType the player has chosen

    • addExtraDevSlot

      public void addExtraDevSlot​(ExtraDevCard card)

    • swap

      public boolean swap​(int depotFrom, int depotTo)
      Method used to perform the action of swapping the resources from one shelf of the warehouse into an other
      Parameters:
      depotFrom - index of the first depot of the warehouse
      depotTo - index of the second depot of the warehouse
      Returns:
      true if can be swapped, false otherwise

    • canMoveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot

      public boolean canMoveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot​(int depotFrom, int extraDepotTo, int quantity)
      Method used to know if an action of swapping a certain resource from a shelf of the warehouse to one of an extraDepot is valid
      Parameters:
      depotFrom - index of the shelf of the warehouse from which player wants to move resource
      extraDepotTo - index of the extra depot in which player wants to move resources
      quantity - quantity player wants to move
      Returns:
      true if the action is valid, false otherwise

    • moveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot

      public void moveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot​(int depotFrom, int extraDepotTo, int quantity)
      Method used to swap a certain resource from a shelf of the warehouse to one an extraDepot It must be called only if the method canMoveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot returns true
      Parameters:
      depotFrom - index of the shelf of the warehouse from which player wants to move resource
      extraDepotTo - index of the extra depot in which player wants to move resources
      quantity - quantity player wants to move

      Parameters:
      inputList - is the list of all requirements to activate the DevCardSlots chosen by the player
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      productionSlotsToActivate - List of indexes of slots to active
      Returns:
      the sum of all requirements grouped by ResourceType

    • isAlreadyIn

      public int isAlreadyIn​(java.util.List<QuantityResource> resourceList, ResourceType resourceTypeToLookFor)
      This method is used to find the index in which there is the resource the caller is looking for
      Parameters:
      resourceList - List of QuantityResource where caller wants to find the occurrence
      resourceTypeToLookFor - Type of resource looking for
      Returns:
      index where there is already the resource, -1 if the resource is not already present

    • canUseDevCards

      This method is used to know whether a combo of ProductionSlots can be used
      Parameters:
      productionSlotsIndexes - indexes of the slots player wants to activate
      Returns:
      true if player can activate the production with the given input, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • removeResourcesInResourceSpots

      public void removeResourcesInResourceSpots​(int fromStrongbox, int fromWarehouse, int fromExtraDepot, ResourceType resourceType)
      Method used to remove a specified resourceType from the different resource spots to pay cards or activate production
      Parameters:
      fromStrongbox - number of resource to take from Strongbox
      fromWarehouse - number of resource to take from Warehouse
      fromExtraDepot - number of resource to take from ExtraDepot
      resourceType - type of resource to remove
